Class ReviewsRepository

java.lang.Object
uni.insubria.theknife.repository.ReviewsRepository
public class ReviewsRepository extends Object
Repository for managing review data in the TheKnife application.

This class provides methods to interact with the repository of Review objects, including loading reviews from JSON files, and performing CRUD operations (Create, Read, Update, Delete) on review data.

The repository handles data persistence and serves as the data access layer for review-related operations in the application. It also manages the relationship between reviews, users, and restaurants.

      public ReviewsRepository()

  • Method Details

    • reviewsByRestaurant

      public static List<Review> reviewsByRestaurant(Restaurant restaurant)
      Retrieves all reviews for a specific restaurant.
      Parameters:
      restaurant - The restaurant for which to retrieve reviews
      Returns:
      A list of Review objects associated with the specified restaurant, or an empty list if the restaurant is null

    • saveReviews

      public static void saveReviews(Map<String,Review> reviews) throws IOException
      Saves the provided map of reviews to a JSON file.

      This method simplifies the review objects before saving to reduce JSON file size by removing unnecessary information and keeping only essential references.

      Parameters:
      reviews - A map containing review IDs as keys and corresponding Review objects as values
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs during file writing

    • loadReviews

      public static Map<String,Review> loadReviews()
      Loads all reviews from the JSON file.

      If the reviews file doesn't exist, creates a new empty file.

      Returns:
      A map containing review IDs as keys and corresponding Review objects as values

    • addReview

      public static ReviewsRepository.ERROR_CODE addReview(Review review)
      Adds a new review to the repository.

      This method adds a review to the repository and updates the associated restaurant's review list. If the review already exists (based on ID), the operation fails.

      Parameters:
      review - The Review object to add
      Returns:
      An ERROR_CODE indicating the result of the operation: - DUPLICATED if the review already exists - SERVICE_ERROR if an error occurs during saving - NONE if the review is successfully added

    • deleteReview

      public static ReviewsRepository.ERROR_CODE deleteReview(Review review)
      Deletes a review from the repository.

      This method removes the specified review from the repository.

      Parameters:
      review - The Review object to delete
      Returns:
      An ERROR_CODE indicating the result of the operation: - SERVICE_ERROR if an error occurs during saving - NONE if the review is successfully deleted

    • editReview

      public static ReviewsRepository.ERROR_CODE editReview(Review review)
      Updates an existing review in the repository.

      This method updates the specified review in the repository if it exists.

      Parameters:
      review - The Review object with updated information
      Returns:
      An ERROR_CODE indicating the result of the operation: - SERVICE_ERROR if the review doesn't exist or an error occurs during saving - NONE if the review is successfully updated
